Articles.Content:
Hello everyone!

I just recently discovered this game, and man am I happy that I found it! I stumbled upon the demo at around 1 AM the night before work in the morning..and couldn\'t put it down! So I guess I can blame it for being sleepy that day, but it was worth it. By 2 AM, I had purchased the full version and struggled to get a rocket that could escape the atmosphere, but that had to wait until the next day.

The next day, I was fed up with being in the atmosphere and built the biggest baddest rocket I could. Sure enough, I blasted the little guys into orbit around the sun.

I\'ve since improved to where I can obtain orbit, and am now on my Mun-landing mission. I don\'t know if it counts, but I crashed into it once!

I\'m definitely glad I discovered this game, because there\'s nothing quite like circling around the moon with the rocket you made and controlled. I can\'t wait to see where future updates lead this game!

Anyway, hello everyone!
Welcome! PM me if u need help.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
